[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    INT   00000000_00000101_01000110_01001110 is converted into TFP   010_01000101_01000110
    INT   11111111_11111010_10111001_10110011 is converted into TFP   110_01000101_01000110
    TFP   010_01000101_01000110 is converted into INT   00000000_00000101_01000110_00000000
    TFP   110_01000101_01000110 is converted into INT   11111111_11111010_10111010_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    010_01000101_01000110 + 110_01000101_01000110 = 000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    010_01000101_01000110 * 110_01000101_01000110 = 110_10001110_11110100
